title: Scaredy Camp
subtle: Adventure (fiction), 1,009 words, Level R (Grade 3), Lexile 710L, Fiction Series
description: In this installment of The Hollow Kids series, Qynn and Sarah go camping on a dark, rainy night. When strange sounds awaken the girls, they call out in fright—but the terror is only beginning. Students will enjoy reading this spooky tale and learning about more clues to help them solve the mystery of what is happening to Qynn and Sarah.
highFrequencyWords: gasp, hunker, inspects, lull, lurking, petrified, screeching, sloshes, slumber, terror, violently, voracious
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
